biblio_en: Sheikh Ibrahim Al-Jibreen is one of the Quran reciters in Saudi Arabia . He was born in Riyadh in 1392/1972. He joined the College of Fundamentals of Religion in the University of Imam Mohamed Bin Saud in Riyadh, where he received a bachelor's degree and master's degree in Islamic Studies, and he is the head of Dorob group for investment and he worked as an imam in many mosques in Saudi Arabia.
biblio_fr: Sheikh Ibrahim Al-Jibreen is one of the Quran reciters in Saudi Arabia . He was born in Riyadh in 1392/1972. He joined the College of Fundamentals of Religion in the University of Imam Mohamed Bin Saud in Riyadh, where he received a bachelor's degree and master's degree in Islamic Studies, and he is the head of Dorob group for investment and he worked as an imam in many mosques in Saudi Arabia.
biblio_ar: لشيخ إبراهيم الجبرين من قراء القرءان الكريم في المملكة العربية السعودية. الشيخ من مواليد مدينة الرياض 1392 / 1972 و قد التحق بكلية أصول الدين بجامعة الإمام محمد بن سعود بالرياض حيث نال درجة البكالوريوس ثم الماجستير في الدراسات الإسلامية، و يرأس الشيخ مجلس إدارة شركة ضروب للاستثمار كما عمل إماماً في العديد من المساجد في المملكة العربية السعودية.
label: jibreen
